ErrorCauseAction.Action: Set the IsModelItem flag to N.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Set the IsModelItem flag to N or change the KitCode.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: An item with variations cannot be a logical kit, a bundle, or a dynamic physical kit.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove component that is an item with variations.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: A logical kit or a dynamic physical kit or a pre-configured item cannot contain an item with variations.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass the KitCode as BUNDLE or PK.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: A configurable item must be a bundle or physical kit item.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide the ConfiguredModelKey or ConfigurationModelName.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: A configurable item must have a ConfiguredModelKey or ConfigurationModelName.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass the IsConfigurable flag as Y.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: A pre-configured item must be a configurable item.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Instruction code must be defined in the config.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Undefined instruction code.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Clear the values of the item's Effective Start Date and Effective End Date or remove associations for the item.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: A superseeded item cannot have multiple item associations.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass IsPreConfigured as Y or change the KitCode or pass IsConfigurable as N.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: A configurable physical kit item must be pre-configured.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Correct the category or add new category to YFS_Category table first.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Category provided in Entitlement Rule Detail does not exist in YFS_Category table.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Correct the SourceType or provide category information, or remove Attribute and Item information if provided.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: CategoryPath is required and elements other than Category must not be populated when SourceType = '01'

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Correct the SourceType or provide attribute information, or remove Category and Item information if provided.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: AttributeID is required and elements other than AttibuteValue must not be populated when SourceType = '02'.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Correct the SourceType or provide a list of items, or remove Category and Attribute information if provided.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Item list is required and Category and elements other than Item list element must not be populated when SourceType = '03'.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Correct the SourceType value.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: SourceType value must be '01', '02' or '03'.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Check the value of Purpose attribute in input XML. Confirm that it is either BUYING or SELLING
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The value of Purpose attribute is not valid

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Check that the organization specified in AssignedToOrganizationCode or SubCatalogOrganization field is a valid sub-catalog organization the catalog organization specified in OrganizationCode field
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Organization specified in AssignedToOrganizationCode or SubCatalogOrganization field is not a valid sub-catalog organization of the catalog organization specified in OrganizationCode field

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Check that the entitlement purpose is correct. If purpose is selling, verify that SourceType=01
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Selling entitlements can only be set up based on categories

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Check that the entitlement purpose is correct. If purpose is selling, verify that only AssignedToOrganizationCode is passed in
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Either one or more of customer attributes are passed or AssignedToOrganizationCode is not passed

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Verify that the category is owned by sub-catalog organization to which entitlement is being assigned
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Selling entitlement based on a category is being assigned to a sub-catalog organization that owns the category

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Verify that the parent category or category domain is owned by or authorized to sub-catalog organization that is creating the child category
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: When a child category is created by a sub-catalog organization, that same sub-catalog organization must be the authorized sub-catalog organization or the owner of the parent category or category domain

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Verify the organization specified in SubCatalogOrganizationCode field has its catalog organization set to the organization specified in OrganizationCode field
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The organization specified in SubCatalogOrganizationCode field does not have its catalog organization set to the organization that is specified in the OrganizationCode field

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Select a non-active search index trigger.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Cannot delete an active search index trigger.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Verify whether the sub-catalog organization should be authorized to or should own the category. Provide either the SubCatalogOrganizationCode or AuthorizedSubCatalogOrganizationCode but not both.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Sub-catalog org both owns and is authorized to the category

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Verify that a search index is marked active.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: In order to perform a search, a search index for this organization must be active.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Either pass Normal, Range, or PriceRange.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The filter type passed is not a valid value.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Verify that the category for which AuthorizedSubCatalogOrganizationCode is being modifed does not have any children.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: AuthorizedSubCatalogOrganizationCode is being modified for a category that has child categories

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass a To and/or From value.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Either To or From must be passed for Range or PriceRange filter types.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass a Value.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Filters of type Normal MUST have a Value.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass a value for IndexFieldName.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: All filters other than PriceRange MUST have an IndexFieldName supplied to filter based on a specific attribute.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Verify Attribute Group, Attribute Domain and Item Attribute Names are provided and are valid.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Invalid or missing data may have been provided or record already existed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass a value for CallingOrganizationCode.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Missing CallingOrganizationCode.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass IsPreconfigured as Y as well as passing BOMXML.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: BOMXML is passed without the item being preconfigured.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass either BOMXML or Components.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Only BOMXML or Components element can be passed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass a valid Locale.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: A locale code was provided that does not match locales in the configuration and a best match could not be found.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: When creating a Search Index Trigger record, pass a value of 01 (scheduled). When modifying a Search Index Trigger record, only a value of 04 (Active) can be passed providing the current value is 03 (Competed).
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: An invalid status was passed for creating or modifying a Status value.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove item components or provide a valid Kit Code
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Kit code is missing when item components are provided in the input.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Bundle component cannot be passed.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Bundle component is a bundle and not preconfigured.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Choose a SortField that is Sortable and NOT_ANALYZED or modify the search configuration for this attribute.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: A SortField was passed that is either not marked as Sortable in the configuration or is not marked as NOT_ANALYZED.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide a PageSize value that is greater than 0.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: A PageSize value was provided that is not greater than 0.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: If providing both To and From values, provide a From value that is less than the To value.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: A To value was provided that is less than the From value for search filters.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Verify that AttributeGroupID, AttributeDomainID and AttributeID match an attribute that already exists.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: No attribute matching AttributeGroupID, AttributeDomainID and AttributeID passed in the input exists.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass in a valid value for the attribute
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: DoubleValue, IntegerValue or Value passed is either invalid based on the attribute type or is not valid allowed value.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Set IsConfigurable flag to Y.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: ConfigurationModelName cannot be set if IsConfigurable is not Y.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide a PageNumber value that is greater than 0.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: A PageNumber value was provided that is not greater than 0.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure the association does not have circular dependency and invalid supersession configuration.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Circular dependency or invalid superession configuration.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass Valid Attribute Name Of Item.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Attribute Name Is Not Valid.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Set the bundle item's IsDeliveryAllowed, IsShippingAllowed, and/or IsPickupAllowed flag to N, or update the item's components so that the delivery methods match its parent bundle.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Atleast one component should match its bundle item for attributes: IsDeliveryAllowed, IsShippingAllowed, and IsPickupAllowed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Select a master attribute with IsAllowedValueDefined flag configured as 'Y' to create an item attribute with item attribute group type of 'FOR_FILTER'.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Creating an item attribute for a master attribute with IsAllowedValueDefined flag configured as 'N' is not allowed for an item attribute group type of 'FOR_FILTER'.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide valid criteria for a Calendar
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: YFS_Calendar record not found for given criteria

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide valid criteria for a Region
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: YFS_Region record not found for give criteria

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide a valid XML
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Invalid root node in input or template XML

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide a valid ItemGroupCode
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: ItemGroupCode should be PS, DS or PROD

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide valid Regions
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: All regions must be from same Region Schema

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide valid criteria for an item.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: ITEM inforamation not found for given criteria

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide valid mandatory attribute
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Mandatory attribute in given XML is Missing

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide valid mandatory element
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Mandatory element in given XML is Missing

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide valid Dates
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Date not passed or End Date is less than Start Date

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide valid Times
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Time not passed or End Time is less then Start Time

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide a valid CapacityOrganizationCode
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: CapacityOrganizationCode is invalid

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide valid criteria of the Resource Pool
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Resource Pool not found for given criteria

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide valid Regions
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Region Schema Keys should be same for all regions

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide valid criteria of the Resource Pool
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Resource Pool Record Not found for given criteria

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide valid Slots
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Time Slots for Capacity Override can not be overlapped

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide valid Node or ProviderOrganizationCode
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: For Provided Services, the Node's owner organization has to be the same as the Provider Organization Code.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide valid ServicedZipCode or ServicedCountryCode
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Either ServicedZipCode or ServicedCountryCode is missing

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide OrganizationCode or CapacityOrganizationCode
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Either OrganizationCode or CapacityOrganizationCode or CallingOrganizationCode is missing

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide OrganizationCode and CapacityOrganizationCode
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: CapacityOrganizationCode does not associate with OrganizationCode

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Either do not pass item group code in xml or make sure existing item group code of resource pool and passed item group code are same
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Api is trying to change item group code of resource pool

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Either do not pass node in xml or make sure existing node of resource pool and passed node are same
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Api is trying to change node of resource pool

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Either do not pass provider organization code in xml or make sure existing provider organization code of resource pool and passed provider organization code are same
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Api is trying to change item group code or resource pool

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Either do not pass capacity organization code in xml or make sure existing capacity organization code of resource pool and passed capacity organization code are same
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Api is trying to change item group code or resource pool

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide valid StartDate and EndDate
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: StartDate is greater than EndDate

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide the correct criteria for Service Slot.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Service Slot record not found for given criteria.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide LotNumber or Tag information.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: No LotNumber or Tag information found.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide appropriate inventory identifier attributes
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Missing inventory identifier attributes

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove ProviderOrganizationCode from the input.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Cannot pass ProviderOrganizationCode for Provided Service Resource Pool.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide a valid ServiceSlotGroup that belongs to CapacityOrganization.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: ServiceSlotGroup not found.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide a valid Calendar that belongs to the node of Resource Pool or its primary enterprise.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Node or its primary enterprise does not own Calendar.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that item or inventory organization of seller organization has ATP rule setup.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: ATP rule is required because organization maintains inventory.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Should use adjustLocationInventory instead.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: INV: Cannot adjust inventory for node with interface type INTEGRATED_WMS.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove Distribution rule from Sourcing rules before deleting Distribution Rule.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Cannot Delete Distribution Rule Being Used in Sourcing Rules

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Must mark inventory picture of a node/item combination as correct first.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Cannot create reservation against a node/item combination for which inventory picture is being marked as incorrect.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Must run the ConsolidateAdditionalInventory agent first.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: INV: Cannot perform inventory synchronization because at least one record exists in YFS_Inventory_Supply_Addnl table.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove the EffectiveDateRanges or set CapacityMaintainAtResourceLevel to N.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: INV: Cannot specify EffectiveDateRanges for resource pool which maintains capacity at the resource level.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove the service resources or set CapacityMaintainAtResourceLevel to Y.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: INV: Cannot specify service resources for resource pool which does not maintain capacity at the resource level.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Change the CapacityUnitOfMeasure to be the unit of measure of type TIME.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: INV: CapacityUnitOfMeasure of resource pool which defines service resources must be the unit of measure of type TIME.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Cancel the operation.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: INV: Cannot override capacity of resource pool which maintains capacity at the resource level.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide a valid service resource.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: INV: Invalid service resource.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide a valid sresource pool capacity consumption details.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: INV: resource pool capacity consumption details.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide a valid capacity.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: INV: Invalid capacity.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide either resource pool or service resource.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: INV: Resource pool or service resource is required

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Change the capacity reservation to be slot based.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: INV: Capacity reservation is not slot based, but capacity is not maintained at the resource level.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide a service resource.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: INV: Capacity is maintained at the resource level but no service resource is provided.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Reduce the capacity to be reserved.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: INV: Not enough capacity.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Adjust the inventory level quantities with the order of minimum to maximum from level 3, level 2, level 1 respectively.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: INV: Invalid inventory level quantity.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide correct value for CapacityMaintainAtResourceLevel attribute.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: INV: Cannot modify CapacityMaintainAtResourceLevel attribute.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide valid start time and end time.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: INV: Start time must be before end time.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide valid StartTime and EndTime in the RegionServiced element.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: INV: Resource pool is associated to regions by slots, StarTime and EndTime must be passed in the RegionServiced element.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove StartTime and EndTime in the RegionServiced element.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: INV: Resource pool is not associated to regions by slots, StartTime and EndTime should not be passed in the RegionServiced element.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove the overlapping service slot from service slot group or use another valid service slot group.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Resource pool that maintains capacity at the resource level cannot have overlapping service slots.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Delete all RegionServiced with the same Region as the one being deleted.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Resource pool is associated to regions by slots, all RegionServiced with the same Region must be deleted if one or more are passed as to be deleted.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass the same value for Priority for all RegionServiced with the same Region.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Resource pool is associated to regions by slots, Priority of all RegionServiced with the same Region must be the same.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass either ResourcePool or ServiceResource.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Cannot pass both ResourcePool and ServiceResource.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass a non-logical kit item.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Cannot adjust inventory for a logical kit item.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass different time for the reservation.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Not enough capacity due to the restriction on maximum number of concurrent appointments.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass different times for the overlapped CapacityPerSlot.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Resource Pool cannot have overlapping CapacityPerSlot

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass a valid value for the inventory node control type.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The inventory node control type passed is not valid.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Delete child slots first to delete the Parent slot.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Slot cannot be deleted if it has child slots

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Appointments should be taken in slots where taking appointments is allowed.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Slot based Capacity Consumption cannot be done on slots that cannot be used for taking appointments

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass at least one ship node.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: No Ship Node is passed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass at least one Demand Type.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: No Demand Type is passed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass required fields
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Required fields are not passed

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass correct ship node in input
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: There is inconsistency in input

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass correct Demand Type in input
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: There is inconsistency in input

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass correct Demand Type in input
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Invalid Demand Type

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Do not pass additional capacity limits in input
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Additional fields are passed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass the capacity UOM for each additional capacity limit.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Capacity UOM is not passed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: The CapacityUOM's UOMType must either be Weight or Volume.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Inconsistency in input

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Do not have more than one limit on additional capacity in the same dimension.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Inconsistency in input

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Only the dimensions in which resource pool maintains capacity can be used as capacity limits.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Inconsistency in input

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the service resource belongs to a resource pool for the requested date range.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The service resource is assigned to multiple resource pools for the requested date range.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that either the service resource key or service resource id and node are passed.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Unique attributes that identify a service resource is not passed. Either ServiceResourceKey or ServiceResourceId and Node are used to uniquely identify a service resource.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the default resource pool to which the service resource belongs is passed in the input.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Default resource pool is not specified for the service resource.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the resource pool specified belongs to same node as that of service resource.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Assigning service resource of one node to resource pool of another node is not allowed. Assignments of service resources to resource pool are allowed only within a node.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that there are no capacity consumptions for the service resource that is being deleted.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Deletion of service resource is not allowed as the service resource has capacity consumptions.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Delete the existing assignment and create another one for the resource.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Modification of a resource is not allowed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that assignments to the same resource pool do not exist in the passed date range.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: A resource can be assigned to only one resource pool on a particular day.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that there are no capacity consumptions for the service resource in the passed date range.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Creation/Modification of service resource is not allowed as the service resource has capacity consumptions in the passed date range.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the end date of the assignment is greater than the current date.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Creation/modification of an assignment should only be in the future. Error is thrown if the end date of the assignment is before the current date.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the service resource id is unique within the node.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The service resource id with which the service resource is being created already exists in the node. A node cannot have more than one service resource with the same service resource identifier.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that either service resource id is unique within the node or use changeResourcePool API to modify the service resource.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: service resource id is not unique within the node. service resource id needs to be unique within the node for the API to function.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Do not modify an existing additional capacity limit for a resource pool.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Once an additional capacity limit is set for a resource pool in a particular dimension, it cannot be modified.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass a non-bundle item.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Cannot adjust inventory for a bundle parent item.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass Tag information for the item.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Item is Tag controlled and Tag information is not passed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Do not modify the resource pool attribute for an existing reservation. Instead, a new reservation can be taken in the other resource pool after deleting the existing reservation.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The resource pool in which a reservation is taken is a unique identifier of the reservation. Modification of this attribute is not allowed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Do not modify the service resource attribute for an existing reservation. Instead, a new reservation can be taken for the other service resource after deleting the existing reservation.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The service resource for which a reservation is taken is a unique identifier of the reservation. Modification of this attribute is not allowed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Give the unique parameters to get only one record.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Multiple record found for inputs passed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Check for proper Serial Number in input.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Trying to do negative adjustment for serial that is not in node.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Check either item details or tag details as they do not match with serial.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Serial mismatch with item key or tag number.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Check for passed serial information.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Serial already exists.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide as many serials as the quantity specified.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The number of Serials is not equal to the quantity specified.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: As serial tracking is mandatory, pass serial information.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Serials not passed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Item not found.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Item not found.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Item has non-zero supply quantity
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Supply quantity for item is non-zero.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the participating enterprises have same set of inventory rules.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The enterprises participating in relationship don't have the same set of inventory rules.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Organization code passed is invalid.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Organization code passed is invalid.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Single serial scanning is required for the item.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Secondary serial exists for the item.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: User Exit needs to be implemented.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Default implementation can only be used for integers.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: From and To Serial numbers need to be entered.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Both From and To Serial numbers are blank.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: To Serial number should be greater than From Serial number.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: From Serial number is greater than To Serial number.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: From Serial number should be entered.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: From Serial Number is blank.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: To Serial number should be entered.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: To Serial Number is blank.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Manual Scanning Required.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: From and To Serial numbers are of different length.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Configure a global item id for the items involved in the transfer.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Global Item Id value for the from item is void.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Choose a supply type of onhand nature.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Supply Type is not of onhand nature.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Serial has to be present at node for passed from and to serial numbers.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: No serial found for passed input at node.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Enter from and to organizations which have different inventory organizations.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Transferring within the same inventory organization is kind of meaningless.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide a valid Region Name.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Region Schema Name is not valid.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Identify a specific shipment for receiving by providing shipment unique attributes.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: More than one Shipment found while creating receipt.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide vaild input attributes for identifying a receipt to receive.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Input XML does not identify a receipt.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Identify a specific receipt by providing receipt unique attributes.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Invalid Receipt Attributes to identify a receipt.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Identify a specific shipment.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Invalid Shipment Attribues to identify a shipment.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that the receipt status is in the pickable status for the transaction.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Receipt Status is not in the pick up status for this transaction.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that the drop status is configured for this transaction.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Drop Status of Receipt is not found for this transaction.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass valid Price Set Parameters
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Invalid Price Set information passed

ErrorCauseAction.Action: BreakQtyHigh, BreakQtyLow should not overlaps across different detail records for the same item price set
Avoid receiving overage for this receipt.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Overage is not allowed for this receipt.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that the shipment status is in the pickable status for the transaction.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Shipment status is not in the pickup status for this transaction.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide shipment attributes like OrderNo, ReleaseNo, etc. in the shipment element.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Shipment attributes like OrderNo, ReleaseNo, etc. are not provided in the input.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that the serial number provided is in the expected information.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The Serial Number provided in the input is not present in the expected information.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Receive the contents of the license plate first.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The license plate has contents which are to be verified.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that the container is not received already.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The license plated container is already received.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that the receipt line should be for a valid shipment line or order line.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Invalid Line to receive

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that the order line has the node to be received or returned populated and it is same as the receipt's receiving node.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The node where the order line should be received or returned is either void or different from the receipt's receiving node.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Receive the physical kit item as a whole instead of kit component.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The item being received is probably a component of a physical kit item.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that the LPN is not pre received already.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Pre receiving is already done for the LPN.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Receive the components in receipt lines without specifying break into components.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Break into components specified in receiving line for which order (order kit line) is not on system.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide Serial Number for the receiving items.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Void Serial Number for item.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that the tag attributes match with the expected information, if provided in the input.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: One of the tag attributes does not match with the expected information.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Add shipment line before receiving.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Cannot Add a line for manually created shipment.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide receipt number in the input or from the user exit.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Receipt Number is void.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Setup the user exit implementaion of getReceiptNo properly.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: User exit getReceiptNo failed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Disable Putaway Complete on Receipt Closure.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The Node does not support Putaway Complete on Receipt Closure.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that the the input UOM is defined for the item.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Invalid Transaction UOM for item.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that End Date is not greater than the associated price set Valid Till Date
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The End Date can not be greater than the associated price set Valid Till Date.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Check that Item_Group_Code passed is PROD, DS or PS.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Invalid Item_Group_Code Passed for the Line

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Check that the Delivery Method passed for the line is correct.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Invalid DeliveryMethod Passed for the Line

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Check that the OptionItemId passed has association with Item of the OrderLine
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Invalid Item Option passed

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Define an association between ServiceLine Item and ProductLine Item
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Service Line does not have any Association with Product Line

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Check that the Product Line passed in association is valid or can be identified using attributes passed
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Invalid Product Line passed in Association

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Check that the Service Line passed in association is valid or can be identified using attributes passed
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Invalid Service Line passed in Association

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Either Change Multiple_Prod_Line_Flag for the Service Line Item or do not pass more than 1 Product associations for Service Item
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Service Line Cannot be associated with Multiple Product Lines

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Check the OrderLine passed in association

ErrorCauseAction.Action: RefundForPaymentMethod must exist on the order in order to refund to it.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The user exit (confirmRefundDistribution) returned RefundForPaymentMethod that doesn't exist on the order.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: RefundForPaymentMethod must be passed when creating a new RefundPaymentMethod that doesn't already exist on the order.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: A new payment method is assigned to be refunded without a RefundForPaymentMethod element.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Precreated Invoice Line must have same item attributes as order line.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Precreated Invoice Line does not have same item attributes as order line.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Stop request cannot be made.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Requested quantity exceeds amount available to stop delivery.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Specify DerivedFromStopDelivery belonging to the DerivedFrom's order line.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: DerivedFromStopDeliveries must belong to the DerivedFrom's order line.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Do not pass DerivedFromStopDelivery.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: DerivedFromStopDelivery can only be used for return orders.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Create two separate lines or return the same quantity.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The return line is for more quantity than the stop delivery request.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass Quantity Greater Than Zero.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Invalid Refund Quantity

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Check if Customer Contact Exists For Given Customer And Buyer User Id.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Cannot Find Customer Contact For The Given Buyer User Id.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide a different bundle item or remove the item with variations from the bundle components in catalog.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Cannot include a bundle item with an item with variations as a component.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Contact CSR if you need to make modifications to the order.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Cannot modify an order which is created from quotes.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Please correct the input.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Action REPLACE_BUNDLE can be passed only for bundle parent order lines.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Please correct the input.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Action REPLACE_BUNDLE can be passed only for existing bundle parent order lines.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Perform the activity after Physical Count finishes.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Physical Count Plan doesnot allow activity to occur before it starts.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Please correct the input.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: If IgnoreStatusCheck is 'Y', then OrderLine element must be passed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Please correct the input.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You are adding components to the parent which is getting deleted.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Call API deleteOrder if you want to delete all the components of a bundle.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You are adding components to the parent which is getting deleted.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: SuccessfulQty must be less than or equal to RequestedQty.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: SuccessfulQty is greater than RequestedQty.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Invoice Line must have a valid order line.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: No Order Line exists for the invoice line.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove any new product or service from the output of the YFSGenerateWorkOrderUE user exit.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Cannot add new product or provided service to the order.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Verify if the condition attribute set meets the IBA criteria.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: One or more condtion attributes does not meet the IBA criteria.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure the payment system has the correct user exit implementation.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: System has detected an error while processing user exit to clear payment transaction.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Verify the date falls between the item's effective start and end date.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The item must be within its effective period.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure the item can be sold separately.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The item cannot be sold separately

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the item status is publishable.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The item status is not valid.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure the ordered item meets the minimum quantity restriction.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The item's minimum ordered quantity is not met.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure the ordered item meets the maximum quantity restriction.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The item's maximum ordered quantity has been exceeded.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the dependency is completed before processing the line.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The system has detected that a line has a transaction dependency with another line.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Set either the first or last sequence number.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: LastIterationSeqNo is less than FirstIterationSeqNo.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Set CanReceiptBeClosed attribute in the output of beforeCloseReceiptUE to Y
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: According to beforeCloseReceiptUE output this receipt cannot be closed

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass either a BOMXML or define the components manually.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Both the BOMXML and components are specified for the line.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass Action along with the new BOM XML.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Both the BOMXML and action are required to the change the bundle on the order.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Refer to the BOM XML for messages related to the cause of the failure.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Refer to the BOM XML for messages related to the cause of the failure.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Use a different ChargeCategory or ChargeName for the manual charge.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: A manual charge being passed to the order conflicts with a charge that is being created by pricing.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Refer to the logs for more details on the specifics of the issue.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Item configurator data is missing from the installation.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: An approval plan getting created has a predecessor or predecessor(s) or predecessor having this plan in the predecessor sequence.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Approval plan getting created or updated has a circular dependency.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass valid attributed.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Approval Rule with specified attributes does not exist.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Before deleting, update approval plan such that it is not a predecessor of another approval plan.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Approval plans that are predecessors of other approval plans can not be deleted.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Either pass OpportunityKey or (OpportunityID and EnterpriseCode).
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Opportunity cannot be identified uniquely with the passed criteria.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Specify a valid PromotionGroup for the Order.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: PromotionGroup passed is invalid.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Specify a valid PromotionGroup for the OrderLine.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: PromotionGroup passed is invalid.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Approval Rule needs to be created with valid Organization, Document Type, Rule ID and Greex Rule.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: One of the four attributes, Organization, Document Type, Rule ID and Greex Rule was not passed or was not valid.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: The returnType must be PureXml.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Greex rule has invalid return type.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Greex rule's output XML Document must have RulesApply and ApprovalRequired attributes.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Either RulesApply attribute or ApprovalRequired attribute or both are missing from the output XML Document.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Replicate the existing quote and pass the existing Opportunity.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Changing an Opportunity for a Quote is not allowed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Create quote and pass new Opportunity.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: An asssociated alternative quote has already been ordered.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Run validateItemForOrdering api for the order and resolve the errors before re-running the current api.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Order line validation for the order has failed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Rework the quote prior to changing the LineType.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The total of a line or the order is being affected by a pricing rule that wasn't previously in affect.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Approval Plan needs to be created with valid Organization, Team Code and User Group.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: One of the four attributes, Organization, TeamCode and UserGroupID was not passed or was not valid.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Predecessor sequence can only be a number or a comma separated list of numbers.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Predecessor sequence has invalid characters.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Order created from quote must have at least 1 line.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Create an order from quote with at least atleast 1 line. Recommended lines are not accounted for, since they are ignored when creating order.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: No Order Approval records found for the user to approve.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: There are no Order Approval records which the user can approve.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: The Rule Must Be Deleted Before Deleting This Order Line Type.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: This Order Line Type Is Being Used In A Rule.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Either use a nonpreconfigured item or configure it in a changeOrder call.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The line being added is being configured for a preconfigured item.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Configure the effective dates such that effective end date comes on or after the effective start date for the order approval rule.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Effective end date comes before start date for the order approval rule.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: A new quote has to be created and presented to the customer because the existing quote has expired and cannot be used anymore.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The quote has expired.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: The quote has to be in created status to add line.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The quote is not in created status.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that PersonInfoShipTo of all the lines in the work order are same.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: All lines included in a work order should have the same PersonInfoShipTo.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide a different item or remove the variant item from the order.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: A variant item is not valid for an order.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: GreexRule attribute should contain a valid advanced XML rule expected by manageOrderApprovalRule API
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: GreexRule attribute contains an unexpected advanced XML rule.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that you have created a document
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have supplied a null input document.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that root node matches up the root node name specified in the documentation.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have supplied an input document whose root node name does not match the documentation.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass valid SCACAndServiceKey.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have passed invalid SCACAndServiceKey.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the lot number of the item being packed or shipped matches the requested lot number on the order.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Customer requested a specific lot on the order and you are trying to ship a different lot number.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the status of the data being processed is one of the valid pipeline pickup statuses for this transaction.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Status not in the list of valid pipeline pick up statuses for transaction.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the object contains valid data.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Internal API invoked with an invalid object.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Check the contents of the input document and ensure that it matches up the input document structure provided as a part of the documentation.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have supplied an input document that does not match up the document as expected in the documentation.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass either DeliveryPlanNo or DeliveryPlanKey as a part of the input XML document.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have not provided the mandatory parameters - either DeliveryPlanNo or DeliveryPlanKey.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass TransactionId to the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have not passed the transaction id.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Set up a transaction for the base transaction.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have not setup a transaction for a base transaction.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass the correct value for ParentContainerNo.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have passed a ParentContainerNo that does not exist for the Shipment.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Set up carrier (SCAC) as an organization on the Platform.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have not setup carrier as a participating organization in the network.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Fill in the Enterprise Code and invoke the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Enterprise code has not been passed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Fill in the Document Type and invoke the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Document type has not been passed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Not much you can do. You should have had no need to perform this modification.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Delivery plan is marked closed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Refer the API documentation and fill in value of Action attribute correctly.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Action attribute with an unsupported value is passed to the API.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Refer the API documentation and fill in value of AssociationAction attribute correctly.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: AssociationAction attribute with an unsupported value is passed to the API.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Verify that the ShipmentNo or ShipmentKey points to a valid shipment.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have passed a ShipmentNo or ShipmentKey that does not point to a valid shipment.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove the shipment from the load using manageLoad API. Then add it to the delivery plan invoking the manaegDeliveryPlan API. Then create a load to include this shipment as a part of the load
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You cannot include shipments belonging to a load into the delivery plan.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove the shipment from the load using manageLoad API. Then remove the shipment from the delivery plan by invoking the manageDeliveryPlan API
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You cannot remove shipments belonging to a load from the delivery plan.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove the shipment from the delivery plan it currently belongs to. Then modify the new delivery plan to include this shipment
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have passed a shipment that already belongs to a delivery plan.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Not much you can do. These are business rules which cannot be violated.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You are adding a shipment whose EnterpriseCode or DocumentType does not match with the delivery plan attributes. Or, the OwnerOrganizationCode on the delivery plan does not match one of EnterpriseCode, BueyrOrganizationCode and SellerOrganizationCode on the shipment

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Not much you can do. These are business rules which cannot be violated.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have passed a shipment for removal that does not belong to this delivery plan

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass RemoveContentOnDelete=Y and invoke the manageDeliveryPlan API
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Delivery plan has contents. Unless you explicitly request for deletion of such plans, the plan will not be deleted.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Not much you can do. These are business rules which cannot be violated.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Closed shipment is added to the delivery plan.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Modify status modification rule to add the shipment status as one of the valid statuses for inclusion in delivery plan. However, ensure that you have carefully considered the implications of allowing this modification
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have set up shipment status modification rules for modification level SHIPMENT and modification type SHIPMENT_INCLUDE_IN_DELIVERY_PLAN to exclude the status of the shipment being included in the delivery plan.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Modify status modification rule to add the shipment status as one of the valid statuses for modification type and modification level. However, ensure that you have carefully considered the implications of allowing this modification.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have set up shipment status modification rules to exclude the status the shipment is in.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass Carrier Service Code and invoke the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have not provided Carrier Service Code which is a mandatory parameter.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Modify status modification rule to add the load status as one of the valid statuses for modification type and modification level. However, ensure that you have carefully considered the implications of allowing this modification.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have set up load status modification rules to exclude the status the load is in.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass LoadNo, (StopNode or StopAddress) that points to a valid load stop.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: A load stop is identified by LoadStopKey or (LoadNo, StopNode) or (LoadNo, StopAddress).

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Correct the LoadNo and LoadKey data and invoke the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have called the API with LoadNo or LoadKey that does not point to a valid load.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Correct the ShipmentNo and ShipmentKey data and invoke the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have called the API with ShipmentKey or ShipmentNo that does belong to the load.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass BaseDropStatus to the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The transaction has multiple base drop statuses. Hence the drop status could not be uniquely determined

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Modify the TaskQKey and invoke the API
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: TaskQKey points to a task queue object which does not exist in the system.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Validate that the transaction should indeed belong to this pipeline. If you are sure, modify the pipeline to include the transaction.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Transaction does in exist in the specified pipeline.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Verify manifest key on the container.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: No manifest exists corresponding to the manifest key on the container.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Nothing to do.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Invoice for Shipment has already been created.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass either ShipmentKey or ShipmentNo in the Shipment element.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have not passed the shipment attributes that uniquely help identify a shipment.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass StopNode or StopAddress that points to a valid load stop.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: A load stop is identified by LoadStopKey or (LoadNo, StopNode) or (LoadNo, StopAddress). And you have not passed any of the minimum information for determining load stop.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass RemoveShipmentsOnDelete=Y and invoke the manageLoad API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Load has contents. Unless you explicitly request for deletion of such loads, the load will not be deleted.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Fill in the OwnerOrganizationCode and invoke the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Owner organization code has not been passed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass PickupShipmentOrigin as Y or pass the load origin stop, and invoke the manageLoad API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Load origin stop must be passed if PickupFromShipmentOrigin is not Y.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass DropAtShipmentDestination as Y or pass the load destination stop, and invoke the manageLoad API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Load destination stop must be passed if DropAtShipmentDestination is not Y.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove all the Shipments of the stop from the load to delete the load stop.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have specified a load stop for deletion that has shipments for pick up or for drop off.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Load stops themselves are based on the shipment pickup and drop. Altering the address of these stops is meaningless operation. Not much you can do. This is a business requirement you must comply with.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You are attempting modification of load stop address of a load stop that has either shipments for pick up or for drop off.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Load stop origin type cannot be modified if pickup from shipment origin is not Y. A load is typically created with options such as PickupFromShipmentOrigin. Changing StopType to any other value will render the load meaningless. Not much you can do. This is a business requirement you must comply with.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You are attempting modification of load stop origin type for a load with pickup from shipment origin as not Y.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Load stop destination type cannot be modified if drop at shipment destination is not Y. A load is typically created with options such as DropAtShipmentDestination. Changing StopType to any other value will render the load meaningless. Not much you can do. This is a business requirement you must comply with.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You are attempting modification of load stop destination type for a load with drop at shipment destination as not Y.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove the completely planned shipments out of the input XML and invoke the manageLoad API. Or, unplan the Shipment by removing it from existing load(s) and then call this API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have passed a completely planned shipment for addition to a new load.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove the shipment in error from the input XML and invoke the manageLoad API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Shipment is being picked up or dropped off at a stop which already exists in a different load.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Not much you can do to add this shipment to the load. This is a business requirement you must comply with.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have passed a shipment whose enterprise code does not match the enterprise code on the load.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Not much you can do. These are business rules which cannot be violated.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: OwnerOrganizationCode on the load does not match one of EnterpriseCode, BuyerOrganizationCode and SellerOrganizationCode on the shipment

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Walk through the programming guide to verify that you have followed all steps related to programming as well as configuration of the user exit.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The properties file may not be pointing to user exit class as required by the create load operation

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Walk through the programming guide to verify that you have followed all steps related to programming as well as configuration of the user exit.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The properties file may not be pointing to user exit class as required by the create shipment operation

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass new Load details.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have passed a load which already exists in the system.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Setup status modification rules and invoke the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have not setup the status modification rules as required by this API.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Correct the XML so that there is exactly one Origin and one Destination stop. Then invoke the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You are trying to create a load with multiple origin or destination stops.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass a valid load stop sequence number honoring the constraints explained in the Cause part of this error code.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The system expects the load stop sequence in the range -1 and 99999. -1 is used to designate a stop of type origin and 99999 to designate a stop of type destination. All other stop numbers designate an intermediate stop.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass a valid Volume UOM.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Volume UOM is blank.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass a valid Weight UOM.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Weight UOM is blank.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass either PickListNo or PickListKey as a part of the input XML document.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have not provided the mandatory parameters - either PickListNo or PickListKey.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass either ManifestKey or all of ManifestNo, Scac and ShipNode as a part of the input XML document.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have not provided the mandatory parameters - either ManifestKey or all of ManifestNo, Scac and ShipNode.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: There is no quantity left to containerize. If you indeed wish to further containerize the shipment, then modify the shipment to add shipment lines and then call the pack API with containerization details.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Shipment is completely containerized.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass the lot number and then call the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have not passed lot number for an item which is configured as lot controlled.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass the ship by date and then call the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have not passed ship by date for an item which is configured as time sensitive.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: There is no quantity left to containerize. If you indeed wish to further containerize the shipment, then modify the shipment to add shipment lines and then call the pack API with containerization details.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have passed quantity for containerization that is greater than the sum of available uncontainerized quantity and the allowed over shipping quantity on the shipment.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass either LoadNo or LoadKey as a part of the input XML document.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have not provided the mandatory parameters - either LoadNo or LoadKey.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass either ShipmentKey or ShipmentNo, ShipNode and SellerOrganizationCode as a part of the input XML document.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have not provided the mandatory parameters - either ShipmentKey or ShipmentNo, ShipNode and SellerOrganizationCode.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass either ContainerNo or ShipmentContainerKey as a part of the input XML document.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have not provided the mandatory parameters - either ContainerNo or ShipmentContainerKey.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Not much you can do. These are business rules which cannot be violated.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Closed load cannot be modified.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Not much you can do. These are business rules which cannot be violated.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Closed shipment cannot be modified.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove the shipment from input XML. These are business rules which cannot be violated.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You cannot specify ship node of the shipment as the drop stop of the shipment.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove the shipment from input XML. These are business rules which cannot be violated.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You cannot specify receiving node of the shipment as the pickup stop of the shipment.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass RemoveContentOnDelete=Y and invoke the manageDeliveryPlan API
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Delivery plan has contents. Unless you explicitly request for deletion of such plans, the plan will not be deleted.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass either ShipmentContainerKey or ContainerNo in the Shipment Container element.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have not passed the shipment container attributes that uniquely help identify a container.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass either ContainerDetailsKey, or OrderHeaderKey, OrderReleaseKey and OrderLineKey in the Shipment Line element.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have not passed the shipment line attributes that help identify a line.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass at least one of the elements LoadStatusAudit or LoadStop with minimum information for updates
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Both LoadStatusAudit And LoadStop Node are absent in the input XML or exist with insufficient information.The minimum information expected is in the API documentation

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Retry the operation
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Any error involving person info that causes insertion into YFS_PICK_LIST failure.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass LoadKey or LoadNo and invoke the API
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Either LoadNo or LoadKey is required to uniquely identify a load.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass PipelineKey and invoke the API
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Pipeline key is required to identify data for which the operation is applicable.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Use a different picklist number that does not exist in the database.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Picklist being used already exists in the database.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Use Pack transaction instead and then perform a close manifest tranaction.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: This is a business process limitation. We cannot allow the user to specify containerization information through the confirm shipment API, if the carrier on the shipment requires manifesting. This is because we will end up having the shipment confirmed with the manifest still open, and the close manifest operation cannot be performed because shipment will not be in a valid pipeline status for closeManifest.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Modify status modification rule to add the shipment status as one of the valid statuses for removal from delivery plan. However, ensure that you have carefully considered the implications of allowing this modification
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have set up shipment status modification rules for modification level SHIPMENT and modification type SHIPMENT_REMOVE_FROM_DELIVERY_PLAN to exclude the status of the shipment being included in the delivery plan.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Check that EnterpriseCode, BuyerOrganizationCode, SellerOrganizationCode, DocumentType, ShipNode and Receiving Node match and remove the Shipment Line in error from the input XML.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Shipment line you are trying to add does not match attributes of Shipment.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass the complete containerization information and invoke the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Carrier requiring integration should perform the pack operation before invoking the confirm shipment option. However, to support situations when server is not up and running or if operation was performed on an external system, it should be possible to confirm shipment. However, it is required that complete containerization information be passed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass ShipNode and invoke the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have not provided ShipNode which is a mandatory parameter.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Correct the ShipNode in the input XML and invoke the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have provided a ShipNode which does not exist in the system.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass SCAC and invoke the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have not provided SCAC which is a mandatory parameter.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Correct the SCAC in the input XML and invoke the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have provided a SCAC which does not exist in the system.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Either complete pack confirmation of the remaining part of the shipment(s) or unpack the shipment and then invoke the close manifest operation.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: When creating a manifest all shipments for the SCAC should be either not containerized at all or should be completely containerized. Partial shipment of a shipment in a manifest is not supported.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Correct the shipment key data specified for unpack and invoke the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You cannot uncontainerize a shipment which does nor have any containers.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove all the lines from shipment before deleting it.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You cannot delete shipments with contents.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove the shipment from load before deleting or cancelling them.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You cannot delete or cancel shipments that belong to a load.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Walk through the programming guide to verify that you have followed all steps related to programming as well as configuration of the user exit.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The properties file may not be pointing to user exit class as required by the create load operation

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Use the packShipment API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You cannot specify pack information for shipments that require carrier integration using the changeShipment API.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass the SellerOrganizationCode in the input XML and invoke the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have not provided SellerOrganizationCode in the input XML.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Walk through the programming guide to verify that you have followed all steps related to programming as well as configuration of the user exit.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The properties file may not be pointing to user exit class as required by the create load operation

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Modification of a closed manifest cannot be allowed since external parties are involved in this interaction. Most carrier systems that Platform integrates with mandates that this operation be disallowed. Specify an open manifest for the ship node and carrier combination. Better still, do not pass any manifest and the system will determine an appropriate manifest.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You are attempting to modify a closed manifest to include shipments.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass the correct manifest number.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have passed a manifest number for which a manifest does not exist in the system.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: You can associate shipments to manifests that have matching values for ship node and carrier. Specify an open manifest for the ship node and carrier combination. Better still, do not pass any manifest and the system will determine an appropriate manifest.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Ship node and carrier on the manifest do not match the corresponding attributes on the shipment.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Setup the transaction configuration if not already set up. Else correct the transaction ID in the input data and invoke the API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Transaction configuration for the transaction ID could not be found in the database.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that you are requesting manifest creation for the desired SCAC. If not, correct the SCAC and invoke the API
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: There are no containerized shipments in the system that can be manifested for the SCAC and ship node.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass the correct values in the Order element and then invoke the API
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: OrderNo and EnterpriseCode in the Order element does not point to an order that exists in the system.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass the correct values in the OrderLine element and then invoke the API
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: PrimeLineNo and SubLineNo in the OrderLine element in association with the OrderHeaderKey does not point to an order line that exists in the system.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass the correct values in the OrderRelease element and then invoke the API
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: ReleaseNo in the OrderRelease element in association with the OrderHeaderKey does not point to an order line that exists in the system.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Modify shipment to have the appropriate consignee account for the CarrierAccountNo attribute in the input XML
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The shipment has a delivery code that requires the consignee account number for billing purposes.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Modify delivery code to a value that does not require the CarrierAccountNo.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The shipment has a delivery code that requires the consignee account number for billing purposes.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Modify ship node to have an address.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Ship node must have an address key to help us determine whether a shipment is domestic or international based on the ship node country.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove shipment from all loads to which it belongs, then modify the Ship To Address (or Key) by invoking this API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Modification of To Address of the shipment will render the load invalid. Hence the modification is disallowed

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Unpack all the containers of the shipment. Then invoke this API for modification of carrier
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Carrier integration has been performed for containerization of either the complete shipment or part of the shipment. Disassociating the shipment from carrier integration actions is considered an exception which should be manually handled. Hence the change is disallowed

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Close the manifest to which shipment belongs
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Shipments belonging to a manifest(Parcel shipments) cannot be confirmed alone. These need to be confirmed collectively by closing the Manifest.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Specify fewer criteria for matching shipments.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: There are no shipments that can be picked up for generating a picklist.

ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Full or part of Shipment line is containerized.
