ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Either you have not passed the bundle component lines or there are no bundle components in ratio with the bundle parent.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: You can add the components of the bundle, which again is not a bundle parent again into the container.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You cannot add bundle parent lines into a shipment container.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: A shipment line cannot be made a bundle parent after being created. If it is desired to be a bundle parent, the component information must be passed when the parent line is created.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: A shipment line was identified as a bundle parent that is not currently a bundle parent.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Do not remove the last shipment line in the bundle.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: An action was taken that would have removed the last shipment line in the bundle.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Either specify the existing bundle line or do not specify at all. API will determine the bundle line for the passed bundle component line.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Bundle shipment line already exists; there cannot be more than one line for a bundle item when order is available on system.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: If the failure occurs because the shipment has been invoiced, the invoice has to be succesfully voided first. There are no further actions for other causes.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Cannot un-confirm the shipment because one of the following conditions is true. Shipment is closed. Shipment has not been confirmed. Shipment is invoiced. Shipment is part of a manifest and the manifest is closed. Shipment is part of a load and the load has been received in transit.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Delivery Method can be changed only from SHP to PICK or from PICK to SHP.Changing from SHP to DEL or PICK to DEL or DEL to SHP or DEL to PICK is not possible.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Cannot change Delivery Method from SHP to DEL or PICK to DEL or DEL to SHP or DEL to PICK.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Shipments requiring return shipping label should not be added to a load. Remove the shipment from the load and then manifest the shipment containers.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: One of the items or container packed inside the load pallet requires return shipping label.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove the hold type from shipment/load.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Modification is prevented for hold type.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove the hold type from shipment/load.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Transaction is prevented for hold type.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: The ShipNode should be passed in the input.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The ShipNode has not been passed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass the actual shipment lines that would be formed if the order release would exist on system.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Order release information passed when the order is not available on system for the shipment.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Logical kit item functionality is disabled hence cannot use logical kit item. Enable logical kit functionality to use logical kit items.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Logical kit item functionality is disabled.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that Dynamic physical kit item shipment line is not mentioned as component of a bundle shipment line and vice versa.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Dynamic physical kit item shipment line cannot be component of a bundle shipment line and vice versa.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that Logical kit item shipment line is not mentioned as component of a bundle shipment line and vice versa.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Logical kit item shipment line cannot be component of a bundle shipment line and vice versa.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Scan Item.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Same Serial number is associated with multiple Items. System cannot identify unique Item.
Not enough quantity to satisfy any shipment completely.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Unpack the shipment container to remove it from manifest.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Container belongs to a shipment which is going to Break Bulk Node and was manifested from Break Bulk Node.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove the order release from shipment and try consolidating again.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The part of release is already consolidated into the shipment.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Perform the activity after Physical Count finishes.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Physical Count Plan doesnot allow activity to occur before it starts.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pack process cannot continue if task type is not configured for pack process .
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Task type is not configured for pack process.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Scan another LPN.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Background reuests are still not complete for the scanned LPN.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Enter quantity at shipment tag serial level.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Quantity at shipment tag serial level cannot be blank.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Correct the quantity to be split from source shipment line.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Quantity to split from soure shipment line is more than receivable quantity.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Correct the Freight Terms.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Invalid Freight Terms.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Walk through the programming guide to verify that you have followed all steps related to programming as well as configuration of the user exit.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The properties file may not be pointing to user exit class as required by the create Work Order operation.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide valid service group like KIT for kitting, DEKIT for de-kitting, COMPL for inventory compliance, INVC for inventory changes and PS for provided service or field service.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The Service Group specified is not valid.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide Components for the Work Order, as the service specified for the item requires components.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: No components are specified.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide either ItemID or CaseID/PalletID.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Both ItemID and CaseID/PalletID are void.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide either CaseID/PalletID or Components, not both.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Both CaseID/PalletID and Components are specified.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Do not specify InvUpdActivityCode if there are no components.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: InvUpdActivityCode is specified but there are no components.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Specify ServiceItemID or list of Activities.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Both ServiceItemID and list of Activities are blank.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Specify at least one Activity.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Activity list is empty.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Activity Sequence No should be unique for a Work Order.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Duplicate Activity Sequence No.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Specify a valid Activity Code.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Activity Code specified is invalid.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Specify SerialNo to all quantity of component or do not specify SerialNo.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Partial Quantity of Component has SerialNo specified.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Specify RequestedQuantity of the parent as one if one or more Components are have SerialNo.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: RequestedQuantity of the parent is not one.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Specify proper unique/primary key for identifying Work Order.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Work Order does not exist.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Modify status modification rule to add the Work Order status as one of the valid statuses for modification type and modification level. However, ensure that you have carefully considered the implications of allowing this modification.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: You have set up Work Order status modification rules to exclude the status the Work Order is in.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Not much you can do once some quantity of Work Order is released.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Work Order has some Quantity Released.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Not much you can do once some quantity of Work Order is allocated.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Work Order has some Quantity Allocated.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Not much you can do once a Work Order Activity is fully or partly confirmed.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Work Order Activity has some quantity Confirmed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Not much you can do once a Work Order Activity is fully confirmed.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Work Order Activity is Fully Confirmed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: The QuantityToBeRemoved while canceling should be made less than or equal to difference of RequestedQuantity and ConfirmedQuantity)
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Quantity to be removed is greater than the difference of RequestedQuantity and ConfirmedQuantity.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Either the quantity to be confirmed for the activity should be made less or all the prior activities should be complete.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Quantity to be confirmed for the Activity is greater than the quantities confirmed for the activities lower in seq no or the prior activites are not completed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass the LPN, if for the quantity being confirmed was previously confirmed on a LPN.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: LPN identifier may not be passed for the quantity being confirmed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Both EnterpriseCode and NodeKey are mandatory for allocating a Work Order.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Either/Both EnterpriseCode and NodeKey not specified.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide at least WorkOrderKey or WorkOrderNo.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: WorkOrderKey or WorkOrderNo not specified.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Partial Allocation Rule should be selected incase inventory is unavailable.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Insufficient inventory and Partial Allocation Rule not selected for the Work Order.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Correct PalletId or CaseId or SerialNo should be passed.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: PalletId or CaseId or SerialNo do not match with those of Work Order.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Sufficient inventory should be available at the Inventory Update Activity Location.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Sufficient inventory not available at Inventory Update Activity Location

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Allocation Rule should be associated with the work order.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: No Allocation rule associated with the work order

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the quantity requested is specified and is positive.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Invalid Quantity Requested for Work Order.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that total activity dtls quantity is less than or equal to quantity requested .
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Activity Dtls quantity greater than quantity requested.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the quantity being confirmed along with the quantity completed for the activity is less than or equal to quantity allocated.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Quantity being confirmed exceeds allocated quantity.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the specified activity is not yet complete.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Activity specified is already complete.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Cancel the work order completely.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The work order cannot be cancelled partially.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that the serial number is already confirmed.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The serial number passed is already confirmed in the activity being confirmed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the serial number exists in the previous activity of the activity being confirmed.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The serial number doesn't exist in the any of the previous activities that are confirmed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the serial number is confirmed on the same license plate as done in the previous activity.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Serial number is being confirmed on a different license plate.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the quantity being confirmed for the passed inputs doesn't exceed the confirmable quantity.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Quantity being confirmed exceeds the confirmable quantity.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the LPN is passed for the quantity being confirmed and doesn't exceed the confirmable quantity.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: LPN identifier is not passed for the quantity being confirmed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide license plate information while confirming the activity.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: License plate information is not passed while confirming the activity.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide Serial number information while confirming the activity.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Serial number information is not passed while confirming the activity.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Confirm each activity of the work order using confirmWorkOrderActivity API.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Confirmation of the work order cannot be done at once for the node.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass the correct date and time.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: End time stamp cannot be smaller than start time stamp.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the Service Item is a valid item meant for performing some service.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Not a Service Item.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the Service Item is meant for the service same as that of the work order.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The Service required by the work order is different from the service offered by the Service Item.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that either the work order has same item attribute or the work order is not for a specific item attribute.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Passed item attributes are different from those on the work order.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Ensure that the work order created serve the purpose of changing the item attributes. The item attributes may be the Segment, SegmentType or ShipByDate or ProductClass etc.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Since there is no change in item attributes, so the work order doesn't serve any purpose.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass the correct date and time.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Start no earlier than date passed is greater than the Finish no later than date.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass the correct date and time.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Appointment start date is greater than the appointment end date.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass at least one service line
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: at least one service lne is required to create a PS/DS work order.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: All lines should have same UOM
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: All the lines passed to the work order should have same UOM.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make the work order item group code as PS or DS
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Product Deliveries are valid for PS/DS work order only.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that all the lines have same ship node as that of work order.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Ship nodes are different for the lines and the work order. If an existing reservation is being copied to Work Order from Order line, the ship node of the reservation could be different from that of the work order

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass the overridden flag if requested quantity needs to be changed.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Requested quantity cannot be modifed unless an overridden flag is passed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: If multiple apointments are required the work order should have multi appointment flag turned on.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: There are more than one appointment that are either open or complete in a work order that has multi appointment flag set to No.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that all the lines have same service address as that of work order.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Service addresses are different for the lines and the work order.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make an appointment and block the capacity.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Work order cannot be moved to planned as the work order has zero allocated capacity.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Only OPEN appointments can be cancelled.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The appointment cannot be cancelled as it is in OPEN status.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Do not try to modify this work order appointment.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Based on the work order's appointment status, it cannot be modified.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass a valid work order appointment in the input.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: An appointment must be passed when confirming a PS or DS work order.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure (quantity already delivered for the line + input QuantityDelivered) does not exceed QuantityRequested.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Cannot confirm more than the quantity requested.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure the value entered for the attribute is a valid value.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Value entered for attribute is not valid.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure QuantityDelivered is not a negative value.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Cannot deliver a negative quantity.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Group work order lines for the same fulfillment types.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Fulfillment type n the service lines should be same.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure capacity is available for the resource pool
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Capacity could not be allocated for the specified appointments.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that either ship node is present on the service line or passed during work order creation or that sourcing is configured correctly.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Ship Node was not passed during work order creation. Ship Node was not passed during order creation. Ship Node could not be determined based on the sourcing.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Item Being Added To The Work Order Should Be Configured To Be Used As Service Tool.
Remove the hold type from work order.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Modification is prevented for hold type.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove the hold type from work order.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Transaction is prevented for hold type.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Either correct i/p xml or configure the hold type.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Hold type is not setup.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Set start and end dates for the work order appointment.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Work order appointments must have start and end dates.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide Components for the Work Order, as the service specified for the item requires components.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: No components are specified.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove this Service Line and then recreate one for the new OrderLine.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Cannot change the OrderLineKey for a Work Order Service Line.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Remove this Product Delivery and then recreate one for the new OrderLine.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Cannot change the OrderLineKey for a Work Order Product Delivery.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Do not put bundle parent lines on a workorder.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Bundle parent line was identified for a workorder line.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Add a service along with the product to the work order.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The work order does not have any services that belong to the same order as the product being added.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Perform the activity after Physical Count finishes.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Physical Count Plan doesnot allow activity to occur before it starts.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide value of ParentSerialNo at WorkOrderComponent level.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: ParentSerialNo is mandatory when Kit is serial tracked.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide same quantity being confirmed as the number of serials scanned for kit.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Number of serials passed for kit cannot be more than Quantity Being Confirmed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Quantity being confirmed should either be an integer or a double.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Invalid quantity being confirmed.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide Single Serials for Kit.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Cannot have Range for a kit which needs serial capture for component.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide same number of serials for components as required by the kit.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Component Serials scanned is more than the Serials required.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Group work order lines for the same level of service.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Level of Service on the service lines should be same.

ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Non billable charge category is specified for rule action that generate uplift or discount.

ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The currency on the price list copied to and the currency of the price list to copy from are different.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that the price list lines are not defined for the price list to which the lines are copied.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that the price list to copy from is different from the copied to.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that price list line belong to the organization.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Price list line does not belong to the organization.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure to valid attributes in PricelistLineUpdate element.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Provide line items.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Line items are missing from input.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass only a single type of value for the item attribute.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Multiple type of values are passed for an item attribute.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that a coupon doesn't have IsManualRule set to Y.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: IsManualRule is set to Y on a coupon.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that a manual adjustment rule doesn't have IgnoreRuleOnManaulAdjustment set to Y.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: IgnoreRuleOnManaulAdjustment is set to Y on a manual adjustment rule.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure atleast one of Adjustment and/or MaximumManualAdjustment is specified for the manual adjustment rule.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Both Adjustment and MaximumManualAdjustment are null for a manual adjustment rule.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that the manual adjustment rule has the RuleCategory set to PRICING.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Manual adjustment rule is defined with RuleCategory as SHIPPING.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Pass PricingRuleKey or PricingRuleName for every ManualRuleAdjustment and invoke the API. One of them is required to uniquely identify a manual adjustment rule.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Neither PricingRuleKey nor PricingRuleName is passed for a ManualRuleAdjustment.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Choose a different charge name and/or charge category for the pricing rule.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The specified charge category and charge name is used for accounting shipping charge of an order.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that the user exit returns all the order lines in it's output.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Number of order lines in the user exit output is less than that of user exit input.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that the adjustment for the flat fee action of the shipping rule is greater than or equal to zero.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Flat fee shipping adjustement is less than zero.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: An assignment can be either to a specific customer or group of customers based on the attributes of customer. Make sure that either one of the customer identifier or attributes of customer is passed and not both.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Assignment has both information of customer and customer attributes.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that the CustomerID passed is a valid business customer.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Pricing rule can only be assigned to business customer. Assignment of pricing rule to a specific consumer is not supported.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that the organization for which the pricing data is being created is a pricing organization. Find the pricing organization for passed organization and create pricing data for that organization.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: The organization for which the pricing data is being created is not meant for pricing.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: A coupon should be created along with the pricing rule in one managePricingRule API call.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Coupon cannot be created with an existing pricing rule.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that the operation is delete if from quantity is passed in the input; as only deletion is supported for a quantity tier line when primary price list line is not specified.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: FromQuantity is passed and the price list line operation is not delete.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that for a manual adjustment rule action, absolute value of MaximumManualAdjustment is not less than absolute value of Adjustment.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Absolute value of MaximumManualAdjustment is less than absolute value of Adjustment.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that for a manual adjustment rule action, absolute value of Adjustment is not greater than absolute value of Adjustment.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Absolute value of Adjustment is greater than absolute value of MaximumManualAdjustment.

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that for a manual adjustment rule action, MaximumManualAdjustment is also a discount if Adjustment is a discount.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: MaximumManualAdjustment is an uplift (greater than zero) and Adjustment is a discount (less than zero).

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that for a manual adjustment rule action, Adjustment is also an uplift if MaximumManualAdjustment is an uplift.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Adjustment is a discount (less than zero) and MaximumManualAdjustment is an uplift (greater than zero).

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that for a manual adjustment rule action, MaximumManualAdjustment is also an uplift if Adjustment is an uplift.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: MaximumManualAdjustment is a discount (less than zero) and Adjustment is an uplift (greater than zero).

ErrorCauseAction.Action: Make sure that for a manual adjustment rule action, Adjustment is also a discount if MaximumManualAdjustment is a discount.
ErrorCauseAction.Cause: Adjustment is an uplift (greater than zero) and MaximumManualAdjustment is a discount(less than zero).
